title: In promos can I get a team that doesn't feed
body:
Title. Thank you.

My team was feeding so hard that their irelia was building 3 trinity forces after I smashed her as nasus.

replies.body:
Your TF game before that puts you as the feeder, with a  4-14 ratio.
Or your top riven game of 3-11.
Also your game in question your stats were average at best too. 45 minute game as nasus should put you in the drivers seat.

I better check the forums for your team mates post about losing due to feeders on their team!

I'm sick of people who troll in ranked, like this Mordekaiser who went 2/6/0 and built only Sightstones.
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/80294752/200327721?tab=overview
I bet these trolls are the same people who complain about trolls and feeders on the boards...

Oh look, this was one of Best Viktor AU's games.
don't mention that its your promos, otherwise it brings out the trolls in some ppl XD
